description:
Archive / backup of the main repository of RiverBench – an open RDF streaming benchmark suite.

Please visit the website to find the packaged datasets, profiles, and documentation.

This artifact serves ONLY as an archive / backup.

If you use RiverBench in your research, please cite it as: Sowiński, P. (2023). RiverBench: an open RDF streaming benchmark suite. https://w3id.org/riverbench

The rest of the backup on Zenodo:

  • Dataset source files (can be used to re-build packaged datasets, if needed)
  • Dataset repositories and code

In case GitHub goes down for whatever reason, the full release packages, metadata, and documentation can be restored from these sources using the ci-worker. The built packages are not stored on Zenodo due to their excessive size.

The license of this artifact is CC BY 4.0, but other parts of RiverBench are licensed separately. Code is under the Apache 2.0 license. Datasets are under their respective licenses (not more restrictive than CC BY-SA).
